ch0149_00_kaki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I see you’re
heading out to do some training again today.
ch0149_00_kaki/0101_0701_02_10:
In dancing and battling, you must work hard every
day to get better!
ch0149_00_kaki/0601_0701_01_10:
I want to become a professional fire dancer, no
matter how hard I have to work.
ch0149_00_kaki/0601_0701_02_10:
I practice dancing as much as I can whenever I
have a spare moment.
ch0149_00_kaki/0601_0701_03_10:
Getting better at dancing requires hard work and
dedication... Pokémon battles are no different.
ch0149_00_kaki/0602_0701_01_10: Many Pokémon live in Alola’s Lush Jungle.
ch0149_00_kaki/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s rich in resources that are important for
Pokémon and humans alike.
ch0149_00_kaki/0602_0701_03_10:
To live in harmony, we must remember that
Pokémon live there, too.
ch0149_00_kaki/0602_0701_04_10: That’s the Alolan way of life.
ch0149_00_kaki/0603_0701_01_10:
I started fire dancing after I saw my grandpa and
his Charizard perform a dance together.
ch0149_00_kaki/0603_0701_02_10:
He was a professional dancer, and when I saw his
movements, I was blown away by them.
ch0149_00_kaki/0603_0701_03_10: I hope to become a dancer just like him one day!
ch0149_00_kaki/0604_0701_01_10:
To tell you the truth, there’s someone who I think
is more suited to being a Captain than I am.
ch0149_00_kaki/0604_0701_02_10:
We danced all through the night with Marowak at
the volcano.
ch0149_00_kaki/0604_0701_03_10:
That training we did helped me become the person
I am today.
ch0149_00_kaki/0605_0701_01_10: Sometimes people are intimidated by my intensity.
ch0149_00_kaki/0605_0701_02_10:
But the other Captains like Mallow and Lana don’t
seem to mind. They treat me like anyone else.
ch0149_00_kaki/0605_0701_03_10:
You don’t seem to mind either. I’m very grateful 
for that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0149_00_kaki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, great timing. I was looking for you.
ch0149_00_kaki/1701_0701_02_10: I wanted to give you this.
ch0149_00_kaki/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you can use it.
ch0149_00_kaki/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I feel uneasy, I head to the top of the
volcano to meditate.
ch0149_00_kaki/2501_0701_02_10:
There, I close my eyes, clear my mind, and allow
my senses to sharpen...
ch0149_00_kaki/2501_0701_03_10:
For some reason, that’s all it takes to lighten
my mood.
ch0149_00_kaki/2501_0702_01_10:
Why don’t we try it together the next time I go to
the volcano to practice my dancing?
ch0149_00_kaki/2501_0702_02_10:
I have a feeling you understand the importance
of meditation.
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0701_01_10: My dream is to be a professional fire dancer.
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0701_02_10: So I was saving money to study dance abroad.
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0701_03_10:
Then, I got fired from my job. I know it had to be
done so the shop could stay in business, but still...
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0702_01_10: It’s unfortunate my plans didn’t work out.
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0702_02_10:
I know my problems aren’t your problems, but I
appreciate you listening to me. You sure are easy
to talk to.
ch0149_00_kaki/2511_0702_03_10: I’ll just have to try to find a new part-time job!
ch0149_00_kaki/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! If you’re still tired, get your blood
pumping with some dancing! It’ll wake you
right up!
ch0149_00_kaki/3003_0701_01_10:
Dancing is a great way to commune with
our Pokémon.
ch0149_00_kaki/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re ever interested in fire dancing, I’d be
happy to give you a demonstration.
